评论概述: Comfy but maybe not great for taller people
评论详情: For reference I am 5'8" and ~185 lbs. I purchased a large and they fit perfectly in the waist/hips and the material is very comfortable, but they were too short for me to wear with flats, let alone with heels. According to the measurement guide the inseam is the same length on every size so if you're taller than 5'6" these pants will probably be too short for you.

These pants are comfortable and cool, especially that I am in a very humid part of the country. They have the line down the middle that make it like slacks but also stretchy enough to be used as active wear. Can be dressed up with a blouse and heels or dressed down in a tank and sneakers. I gained some weight since I purchased the pants, so even though it's not as a-line fitted, it still compliments my curves and provides mild supportive tummy control.
This is legging material, not slacks material

These look really small when you first open them up, but they fit well and are very comfortable. I ordered my regular size (XL) and I am glad I did. The material has a nice stretch to it and it very easy to maintain. I will say that you must be careful when ironing these pants. They slim you just a tad but it gives the best high waisted look. I would definitely recommend getting these.

5'2 110lbs for reference, ordered Xsmall. I can't tell if they're really flattering or not. The wide leg style looks good in all the places that you would expect a wide leg to look good on, but the material is not very flattering in the front. Speaking of material, it is VERY thin and shiny so they do appear cheap. Overall I would wear these for a more casual look, but not when expected to adhere to a dress code.

评论概述: Love or Hate? To Size Up or Not?
评论详情: This pair of pants is very interesting.  I can’t say for sure if I love or hate them.  I think it’s more love to hate them!Let’s start with the material.  It’s a very thin, stretchy, slightly sheen, very nylon-type of material.  They are not the same type of material as yoga tights.  They fit snugly from waist to hip, then fall straight down.  I really like the seams in the front and back.  They really add character to these pants.  They are super comfortable, and they fit so snugly that it looks like they give my hips a little lift.  However, because the material is skin-tight, it will show panty lines or anything that’s uneven.The back looks okay, but that skin-tight fitting also applies to the front, and that’s not too flattering.  That’s my problem.  I love that they’re comfortable, but it’s like wearing regular pantyhose that shows everything.  I would still wear these pants, but probably with an oversized top that covers the front.  I wonder if it would have been better if I had ordered a size bigger.For reference, I am 5’7” and 130 lbs.  These pants fit me skin-tight from waist to hips, but because they’re stretchy, they’re comfortable, just very revealing.
I purchased these pants for my MIB halloween costume and they were super warm and comfortable the whole night.
Loved the way these pants fit, buy are to small in the waist.
